thread.section_title: Bay Alarm Medical Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bay Alarm Medical | www.bayalarmmedical.com
thread.title: F. Jason Di Palma
thread.title_full: Bay Alarm Medical reviewed by F. Jason Di Palma

author: F. Jason Di Palma
title: F. Jason Di Palma
text: Since my other half has been away much of the time for work I find myself alone most nights. This never bothered me when I was younger but now that I am a senior I felt a bit uncomfortable knowing that there is always that possibility that the unexpected could occur while I am alone. The Bay Alarm Medical was the perfect answer and I can sleep confidently knowing that should a problem arise I can call for help immediately. I hope I never have to use it but it is nice knowing it is there. It also gives me protection when I am outside working in my yard.
